Package network

Class Summary
Client The client is used to connect to a remote server, to manage the communication between remote server and local client and to synchronize the remote and local game.
Protocol A collection of constants and utility methods used by the 'Kaskade'-protocol.
ProtocolRequest A collection of methods that interpret command strings that are being received from a remote server.
ProtocolResponse A collection of methods that generate command strings that are being posted towards a remote server.
Server The Server takes requests from remote clients to start a new console game and allocates a new service thread to the client to play the game.
ServerPreferences Preferences for the configuration of the server.
Service A class that works as server for a remote client by communicating with the console player and synchronizing the local game with the console output.
 

Exception Summary
IllegalCommandException Exception thrown if an illegal command occurs within a client-server -communication via the 'Kaskade'-protocol.
RemoteGameSynchronisationException Exception thrown if synchroniszation between a local and a remote game is not successful.
